title: Novo Nordisk to support MIT postdocs working at the intersection of AI and life sciences
summary: MIT's School of Engineering and Novo Nordisk have launched a program to support postdoctoral fellows conducting research at the intersection of artificial intelligence (AI) and data science with life sciences. The MIT-Novo Nordisk Artificial Intelligence Postdoctoral Fellows Program will provide up to $10 million annually for a cohort of up to 10 postdocs for two-year terms. The program aims to advance the use of AI in life science and health and will offer professional development, mentorship opportunities, and entrepreneurship-focused workshops. The program coincides with Novo Nordisk's 100th anniversary celebration.
